page.title: 10CONTINUATION PAGE 9
page.content: ON WEDNESDAY AND THURSDAY THE MAIN EVENTS WERE AS FOLLOWS: MINI-RUGBY,FIVE-A-SIDE FOOTBALL,A FLORAL ART DISPLAY AT{ST. GEORGES CHURCH,BRASS-BAND CONCERT AT THE LABOUR CLUB. ON FRIDAY THE FLORAL ART WAS JUDGED, THERE WAS A SWIMMING GALA AT TYLDESLEY BATHS AND THE FINAL OF THE FIVE-A-SIDE FOOTBALL. SATURDAY THE 25TH OF MAY WAS{CARNIVAL {DAY}WITH A{PARADE OF FLOATS}WHICH BEGAN OFF MORT LANE. THE CARNIVAL QUEEN, KAY ROBERTS AGED 19, THE PRINCESS, JOANNE HURLOCK OF GARRETT HALL SCHOOL, AND THE ROSEBUD, JULIE UPTON FROM ATHERTON, WERE CROWNED IN THE PRESENCE OF THE{MAYOR AND MAYORESS OF WIGAN. A TUG OF WAR, EXHIBITION OF LOCAL PHOTOGRAPHS AND THE UNUSUAL EVENT OF ARM WRESTLING ADDED TO THE EXCITING WEEK'S PROGRAMME.
